CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Appointment_results__c , "Completed") || ISPICKVAL(Appointment_results__c , "Partial") || ISPICKVAL(Appointment_results__c , "Sale Cancelled") || ISPICKVAL(Appointment_results__c , "Sale Approved") || ISPICKVAL(Appointment_results__c , "Pending Cancel") || ISPICKVAL(Appointment_results__c , "Sale Pending"), 1, 0)
CustomField.label: Sale completed
